ev3steuerung
Class EV3_Brick

java.lang.Object
  ev3steuerung.EV3_Brick

public class EV3_Brick
extends java.lang.Object

EV3_Brick contains lightweight Hardware-Access and mimicks the Machine virtually

Since:
01.04.2016
Version:
0.8
Author:
Christoph Schmidt

Method Detail

emergencyShutdown

protected void emergencyShutdown()
Method to call from MqttHelper when "emergency shutdown" message arrives. This sets the state forcibly to ShuttingDown

See Also:
ShuttingDown, MqttHelper

protected boolean isConfirmed()
Check if a Confirm message has arrived

Returns:
True - If there has been a "confirm" message recieved
See Also:

isFixed

protected boolean isFixed()
Check if a Manual fix message has arrived

Returns:
True - If there has been a "manual fix" message recieved

protected boolean isProduce()
Check if a produce message has arrived

loadRecipe

protected ev3steuerung.rezeptabarbeitung.Recipe loadRecipe(java.lang.String recName)
Starts the Loading of a certain Recipe

Parameters:
recName - The name of the Recipe to load up
Returns:
Recipe that shall be loaded
See Also:
Proc, Recipe.load()

manualFix

protected void manualFix()
Method to call from MqttHelper when "manual fix" message arrives. This sets a fix flag, if the current State is instanceof Maint

See Also:
Maint, MqttHelper

messageArrived

protected void messageArrived(java.lang.String message)
Method to call when a message is recieved on the Topic vwp/DEVICE_ID. No Checks have been made to the input. Handles produce, confirm, sleep

Parameters:
message - Message that arrived over Mqtt from MES
See Also:
MqttHelper, Mqtt-Threads

setState

protected void setState(ev3steuerung.State state,
                        boolean forced)
Changes the State to a given new state

Parameters:
state - New State to work next
forced - If the State shall be forced or not, default false. If true, no change of state can occur after this.

startMqtt

protected void startMqtt()
                  throws java.lang.InterruptedException
Method to start MQTT-Handling by creating a new MqttHelper Class and setting mqttHelper

Throws:
java.lang.InterruptedException - When there was a problem creating the mqtt-handler
See Also:
MqttHelper

stopMqtt

protected void stopMqtt()
Stops the Mqtt-Handler, closes all connections and deletes all folders

See Also:
Control, MqttHelper.close()

wait

protected void wait(int time)
Waits a given time in ms

Parameters:
time - time in ms

protected void waitForButtonPress(java.lang.String but)
Waits for specific Button Press (default any)

but - - String representation of Button to be pressed
